name: Calvonics - Space Rescue Operation
description:
[Made for the Game Dev Week 2021.2]
Calvonics - The Space Rescue Operation

Rescue as many people and their cargo as you can. Beware of asteroids and solar radiation. Can you make it in time?

How to play:
Find and collect cargo boxes and lost astronauts to gain money.
Distress Calls will appear, use your radar and the HUD to find them.
Avoid crashing into objects and don't get too close to the sun.
Collect as much money as possible before the time runs up.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Mouse - Camera and Steering
F - Interact
Shift / Left Mouse Button - Boost

Credits:
Katarina Sologub - Character Artist & Animation
Marc "Magges92" Massilge - Audio Programming & Level Design
Lola E. - Environment Artist
Kawaiidoscope - Programming
Simon "TheSimilier" Gemmel - UI Programming
OLKO - Programming & Technical Artist
